name: SHA SHEE SHA 2
description:
Mama returns in this new action-packed adventure!
Connected you strengthen your parental bond (and score) - so move fast as not to stay apart. Dodge danger, rescue your baby olive and launch it at your enemies, destroying them with the power of motherly love and increasing your score multiplier.
Move around with left mouse button and throw your baby with the right mouse button.

Programming - Paulo Scabeni
Visual Art - Vacilão
Sound - Victor Caramez
